description: video game composer. He started as a composer in Procyon Studio, where he would collaborate for the soundtrack of Luminous Arc and Super Smash Bros. Brawl. After that, he joined Game Freak, where he did work on the soundtrack for Pokémon HeartGold and SoulSilver, Pokémon Black and White, and Pokémon X and Y. He also worked on the music of Pokémon Origins.
